name: Police Moto Bike Rider
description:
Clear all the streets from bike gangsters and from their partners in bike racing vs. city criminals bike game. Having interesting levels and challenging various types of tasks, game will never make you bore. Show your driving skills to the max and chase the thief quickly within time limit.

Huge city means that the streets are full with traffic vehicles, this makes the chasing a much difficult task. Drive on the roads of big city but watch out the crazy drivers while chasing the thief. Completing levels will award you some cash use the cash to unlock more interesting missions and to buy more powerful speedy cop duty powerful bikes game. Choose the best police bike from the police garage and become the shine of the asphalt roads racing games.

Features:
• Free to play
• Cool thief catching animations
• Realistic city Environment
• Multiple police bikes
• Realistic sounds
